content: through of the previous color as in the 1st photo below chain 1 2 fpedc 1 around each treble_crochet of round 4 single_crochet in the double_crochet of round 5 double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in the fl of the st between the 2 double_crochet of round 5 indicated with the needle in the 1st photo below single_crochet in the next double_crochet of round 5 x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st fpedc and pull through c 1 ch1-space 2 single_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 fpedc round 7 c and b if this round is crocheted in 2 colors double_crochet bold writing is crocheted in the second color if this round is crocheted in 1 color only versions 1 and 3 then the stitches in bold writing are simply crocheted in the same color as the other stitches of the round chain 1 fpsc around both fpedc of round 6 see 1st photo below fpedc single_crochet double_crochet in the st between the 2 double_crochet of round 6 indicated with the needle in the 2nd photo below single_crochet fpedc x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st fpsc and pull through a 2 single_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 fpsc 2 fpedc round 8 a chain 1 single_crochet fpedc single_crochet fpedc 2 single_crochet the 2nd single_crochet is made in the fpsc of round 7 x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st single_crochet and pull through c 4 single_crochet 2 fpedc © big splash by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 10 round 9 c and b no increases are made in this round if this round is crocheted in 2 colors fpedc is crocheted in the second color if this round is crocheted in 1 color only versions 1 and 3 then all stitches of this round are crocheted in the same color chain 1 single_crochet fpedc 2 single_crochet fpedc3tog the 2nd leg is made around the fpsc of round 7 see 1st photo below skip 1 st behind the fpedc3tog single_crochet x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st single_crochet and pull through a 4 single_crochet 1 fpedc 1 fpedc3tog round 10 a the fpedc2tog is made around the fpedc s of round 8 as in the 1st photo below do not skip any st behind the fpedc2tog chain 1 single_crochet fpedc2tog 5 single_crochet x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st single_crochet and pull through b 6 single_crochet 1 fpedc2tog round 11 b chain 1 single_crochet in the fpedc2tog of round 10 single_crochet double_crochet in the loop indicated in the 1st photo below treble_crochet in the single_crochet of round 7 see 2nd photo below double_crochet in the loop indicated in the 3rd photo below skip 2 st behind the double_crochet-treble_crochet-double_crochet single_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet double_crochet skip 1 st behind the double_crochet- treble_crochet-double_crochet single_crochet x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st single_crochet and pull through a 4 single_crochet 4
